InstructionData.Title: RoboMeter
InstructionData.Author: Saddamo De Beers
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias RoboDistance1 r1 alias RoboDistance2 r2 alias RoboDistance3 r3
alias RoboBase1 r6 alias RoboBase2 r7 alias RoboBase3 r8
start: move RoboBase1 71 move RoboBase2 71 move RoboBase3 71
l RoboDistance1 d0 PositionX l RoboDistance2 d1 PositionX l RoboDistance3 d2 PositionX
round RoboDistance1 RoboDistance1 round RoboDistance2 RoboDistance2 round RoboDistance3 RoboDistance3
sub RoboDistance1 RoboBase1 RoboDistance1 sub RoboDistance2 RoboBase2 RoboDistance2 sub RoboDistance3 RoboBase3 RoboDistance3
s d3 Setting RoboDistance1 s d4 Setting RoboDistance2 s d5 Setting RoboDistance3
yield yield
j start
